changes: Fixed a bug related to the statistics menu and other menus not displaying.
Complete redesign of the resource to ensure consistency across VMS resources
Added management menu, similar to the one in vms_tuning/vms_vehicleshopV2/vms_stores
Added membership and protein sales in management menu when gym is configured as business
Added receipt for membership or protein payment known from vms_tuning/vms_clothestore among others
Added custom menu for buying memberships and proteins in the gym instead of esx menu/qb menu/ox menu
Added ability to combine memberships (you can renew your current one)
Introduced compatibility with the tax system and job resumes from vms_cityhall
Moved many options from config.lua to config.client.lua and changed the prefix from Config. to CL.
Moved UI translations to the translations.json file (Multi-language: EN, DE, FR, ES, PT, PL, CZ)
Blocked switching from exercise to exercise using the target that caused the bug.
Added server-side exports for skill management (getSkill, addSkill, removeSkill) - described and available in documentation
Fixed adding of flying skill
Fixed condition booster for treadmill exercises
Fixed hourly memberships for non-business gyms
Added Config.UnitOfSpeed - if you use the driving skil and its effects, you can customize the speed system for your server

Added Config.EnableSkillDrivingEffects & Config.SkillDrivingEffectMinimumSpeed - With low driving skill your vehicle will run into slides more often or through lack of skill will randomly turn, the higher the level the less or no effect it has, you can already change it using this option not required changes in config.client.lua, also you can change minimum speed to get effects
Added shootingBlacklistWeapons list with the ability to enter weapons that will be blocked for skilling - config.client.lua
Added ability to set up hourly memberships
Added extra math.random to the chance of getting the shooting skill to make it not so easy
Corrected title for qb-menu and ox_lib when accepting membership purchase.
Added automatic removal of strenght skill when no training is given
Fixed elements titles for qb-menu in membership menu
Fixed server-side error for saving statistics when no players are online
Added for Config.Gyms the blipEnabled option
Fixed a problem with saving statistics
Fixed Config.Target for qb-target
Changed events Config.PlayerLogoutServer
Fixed a bug with increasing skil level while riding on a passenger
Added skill "Flying" - now players have separate driving of land vehicles and flying vehicles
Added two boosters items 'protein' and 'runbooster'.
Added booster event condition and strength: "vms_gym:runConditionBooster", "vms_gym:runStrengthBooster" with parameter multiplier, time.
Added to the statistics menu buttons responsible for the ability to turn off and turn on for themselves notifications of skilling increase or decrease
Added Config.EnableStaminaModifier - you can modify a character's stamina level, which results in the ability to sprint longer without fatigue
Fixed disabling individual skill options in Config.StatisticsMenu so that this statistic could not be boosted
Improved random twist and slip for driving skill
Improved the addition of driver-only driving skills
Fixed notifications of increase and decrease of skill for values below 0.0 will not be displayed for decrease and above 100.0 will not be displayed for increase either
Server-side error problem corrected
Fixed Config.PlayerLogoutServer event that saves player stats when logging out of server on QB-Core
